title: Hands down the bestest of all
review: This is the bestest performance by Al . He was unbelievably indulged in to his character that you would totally forget that it's just a movie and not a real life. It is 10/10 for me.

title: Better than Goodfellas
review: I see people always compare this movie to goodfellas, but for me it is far better than goodfellas. It is 10 out of 10 for me. A must watch.
